title: Duality in Topological Quantum Field Theories
abstract: This thesis presents a thorough analysis of the links between the N=4 supersymmetric gauge theory in four dimensions and its three topological twisted counterparts. Special emphasis is put in deriving explicit results in terms of the vacuum structure and low-energy effective description of four-dimensional supersymmetric gauge theories. A key ingredient is the realization of Montonten-Olive duality in the twisted theories, which is discussed in detail from different viewpoints.
